snippet: Jonathan Martin was traded from Miami to the San Francisco 49ers on Tuesday night, reuniting the lineman with his college coach at Stanford, Jim Harbaugh.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Miami Dolphins trade offensive tackle Jonathan Martin to the San Francisco 49ers, where he will be reunited with his college coach at Stamford, Jim Harbaugh; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Jonathan Martin was traded from Miami to the San Francisco 49ers on Tuesday night, reuniting the lineman with his college coach at Stanford, Jim Harbaugh.
